CustomField.formula: IF(VALUE(MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,7,3)) <= 749 && VALUE(MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,7,3)) >= 500, '18' + MID( INT_PersonIdent__c ,5,2), IF(VALUE(MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,7,3)) <= 499 && VALUE(MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,7,3)) >= 0, '19' + MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,5,2), IF(VALUE(MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,7,3)) <= 999 && VALUE(MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,7,3)) >= 900, '19' + MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,5,2), IF(VALUE(MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,7,3)) <= 999 && VALUE(MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,7,3)) >= 500, '20' + MID(INT_PersonIdent__c,5,2), '' ))))
CustomField.label: Birthyear
